title: Must Watch: Szymon & David Godziek’s wild Red Bull backyard training tracks & NS bikes
content:
Red Bull BMX, freeride & slopestyle brothers Szymon & David Godziek have been taking sibling rivalry to new extremes with the backyard training tracks they call home. For a year and a half, we at Bikerumor have also been getting more serious about building backyard features to hone technical bike riding skills while our broader […]

The post Must Watch: Szymon & David Godziek’s wild Red Bull backyard training tracks & NS bikes appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
